item.title: Every Static Blog Engine 1 - Gatsby
item.description: Preparation Link to heading I installed NodeJS 14 LTS with package managers.On Windows I installed scoop. On Mac I installed brew. Install gatsby-cli Link to heading Installing gatsby-cli appears to be smooth on both platforms. I saw no error on both Windows and Mac. npm install -g gatsby-cli npm install is quite slow in China. There are Chinese NPM mirrors. If you don’t want to use the mirrors, you can use VPN to speed things up.
